column5: A few pics from my buddy's boat while daytripping to Campbell's Bay on Nipissing.       RFS
So thats what a deer looks like. Cool pics .
De tr√®s belle photos Randy     Beau Buck Merci de les partagers!!! Jacques
Thats a pretty nice buck i have only seen moose swimming never deer thanks that was cool..
Sweet! Looks like those rocks might have been a little slippery.  What month was that photo taken in?
Cool pics...what compels them to jump in and swim? Exploring different territory? Islands?
I think you're right on both assumptions.  the pic is blurry but there is also a Doe here but she was ashore already.... he may have been chasing her.    RFS

Check this theory as to why the deer was swimming in Lake Ontario...happened last year off Port Credit.  http://www.thestar.com/News/Ontario/article/449503  I think there was talk after that rescue that the two involved were going to be charged for interfering with the deer (not sure that ever happened)
The grass is always greener on the other side of the Island...
